origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'HousingFundAPI.get_loan_approval_time', 'description': 'This function provides an estimate of the loan approval time for housing funds based on the application type and loan amount.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'applicationType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of loan application, e.g., firstTime, secondTime.'}, {'name': 'loanAmount', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The amount of the loan applied for.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'approvalTime', 'description': 'The estimated time for loan approval.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 HousingFundAPI.get_loan_approval_time, 它的参数输入如下: 'applicationType'是'firstTime', 'loanAmount'是'300000'.
